name: Janet BEM v. August BEM, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDER-MOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
NIX, C.J., and McDERMOTT, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: Janet BEM v. August BEM, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed.
NIX, C.J., and McDERMOTT, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Bernard E. Zbrzeznj, Philadelphia, Marvin Wilenzik, Norristown, for appellant.
Myron H. Deutsch, Philadelphia, Thomas J. Sibert, Ebensburg, Dale G. Larrimore, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
482 A.2d 1273
Janet BEM v. August BEM, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 24, 1984.
Decided Nov. 5, 1984.
Bernard E. Zbrzeznj, Philadelphia, Marvin Wilenzik, Norristown, for appellant.
Myron H. Deutsch, Philadelphia, Thomas J. Sibert, Ebensburg, Dale G. Larrimore, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDER-MOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
